name: NSTableCellView
desc: A reusable container view shown for a particular cell in a table view that uses rows for content.

items.name: var objectValue: Any?
items.desc: The object that represents the cell data.

items.name: var backgroundStyle: NSView.BackgroundStyle
items.desc: This property is automatically set by the enclosing row view to let this view know what its background looks like.

items.name: var draggingImageComponents: [NSDraggingImageComponent]
items.desc: Returns dragging images for the cell.
